title: My rank is being Shielded?
body: I've been pretty tilted recently and my elo has suffered. However after another lost i got a message telling me that my rank is being shielded so i wont derank.... So im hoping someone can better explain this. How long does it last? Do i need a certain more loses to be demoted etc...  please help explain

replies.body: I think congrats might be in order, as you only get that demotion shield when you've recently been promoted into a new division or tier.  Since you recently got went up in rank, that shield is there to prevent you from _immediately _ dropping a rank just because of an unlucky streak. Check out our [**ranked faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3q2) for some other interesting tidbits on ranked play you may not know yet!
